```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Specify packages needed
pacman::p_load(
  here,
  readxl,
  tidyverse,
  sf
)
```

# Step 1) Loading initial latlong data
```{r Initial Data}
latlong <- read_excel(path = here("data", "raw", "atlas_locations_raw.xlsx"),
                            sheet = "INDEX") %>%
  select(-Num)
```

# Step 2) Converting to sf object
```{r}
sf <- st_as_sf(latlong, coords = c("Longitud", "Latitud"), crs = 4326)
```

#Step 3) Writing geopackage

Geopackage contains columns of location name from the raw coordinates data columns (Localidad), Atlas specific site key (Clave), and coordinate point (geometry).
```{r}
clean_path <- here("data", "processed", "landingsites.gpkg")
st_write(sf, clean_path)
```
